events.name: Opening Ceremony & 1st Conference
subtopics: Contributions and Vision of Morocco in Scientific Research
Exploration of Space Science and Satellite Communications
Open Science and the Utilization of Open Data
Effective Utilization of Scientific Data for Various Purposes
Space Science and Open Data in Morocco

events.name: Coffee Break
events.description: Participants can take a coffee break, network, and enjoy refreshments provided during the break.

events.name: Networking Session
events.description: Interactive networking session for participants to connect with industry professionals and expand their network.

events.name: Workshops: for Students and Researchers
events.description: Empowering Students and Researchers with Technical Skills
workshopTopics: Cloud Computing: Fundamentals and Use Cases
Artificial Intelligence: Introduction and Practical Insights
Cybersecurity: Best Practices and Threat Mitigation

events.name: Workshops: for Kids
activities: Kids will engage in hands-on activities, building robots using LEGO, Arduino kits, and other resources.
Kids will explore astronomy, observing celestial objects through telescopes and learning about planets in our solar system.

details.name: Participants Pitch
details.description: Finalists will pitch their projects to a larger audience, including industry experts and potential investors.

events.name: 2rd Conference
topics: Exploration of Extreme Science and Technological Advancements

events.name: Success Story & Closing Ceremony
events.description: The event will conclude with a festive closing ceremony, featuring music, entertainment, and networking opportunities. The Hackathon winners will be acknowledged during the closing ceremony.
